definition: a heavy dull sound (as made by impact of heavy objects), to gather or cause to gather into a cluster
details:
noun
- a heavy dull sound (as made by impact of heavy objects)
= synonyms: thump
- a grouping of a number of similar things
= synonyms: bunch, cluster, clustering
- a compact mass
= synonyms: ball
verb
- to gather or cause to gather into a cluster
= synonyms: bundle
- to walk clumsily
= synonyms: clomp
- to come together as in a cluster or flock
= synonyms: flock, cluster, constellate
- to make or move along with a sound as of a horse's hooves striking the ground
= synonyms: plunk
